content.title: <TextStyle.White>CURRENT NEWS</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.White>Welcome to My Other Life Cluster</>
This cluster is for people who want to take it easy, and reach end-game quickly without a lot of time invested. 

<RichColor Color="0,0,1,1">2025-10-08 Current Maps</>
- Extinction
- Ragnarok
- The Island
- Valguero


2025/10/08 Valguero map is added to My Other Life ASA cluster.
(scroll down for older news)


2025-01-28 End of Aardwolf's Birthday Celebration & The Wild Hunt

2025-01-01 Rebuild Progress: 
- Working on final settings for all 5 clusters. 

2025-01-01
- Dino Depot is removed. 
- Potions Plus by Gaia is added.
- Settings for B+, Super Cryo Storage, Potions Plus, GG Sky Islands, and starters for WBUI are done!

2024/12/20 My Other Life ASA Extinction Server is Online!

content.title: <TextStyle.White>FUTURE NEWS</>
content.text:
My Other Life ASA WILL BE REBUILT with all official DLCs. 
--- We have purchased the motherboards, memory, and CPUs of the original servers from Aardwolf's daughter and some new parts to complete the servers back to what they were. 

2025-10-?? to 2025-10-24
Aardwolf's Memorial Event

2025-10-08 
I am currently building the machine for a different cluster. My Other Life ASA is the third cluster I will build after My Other Descent and My Other Life ASE. When the cluster is built on our physical home hosted machines I will try to host all current official maps with the equipment we have available.

content.title: <TextStyle.White>Who are My Other Arks?</>
content.text:
My Other Arks continues the legacy begun by Aardwolf in 2017 with his multiple clusters for ARK Survival Evolved. At the height of our community, we had over 51 servers across 4 clusters. 

We're in the process of rebuilding after Aardwolf passed away in October, 2024. 

We have one to four maps up for each of the original 5 clusters that existed at the time of Aardwolf's passing, and some of the original server components to begin rebuilding! The only limit on having our clusters rebuilt to where they were is the time for Rebelweasel to physically put them together. 

We have 2 ASE servers and 2 ASA servers. 
All ASA servers have within-game Cluster & Discord Cross-Chat. 

Here is a brief description of all clusters within My Other Arks. Each one is carefully tuned to a different range of difficulty and play-style.

<TextStyle.White>---ASA CLUSTERS FOR DIFFERENT PLAY STYLES---</>
<RichColor Color="0,0,1,1">My Other Home [Home]</>
- PC Only. 
- Build, deco, some custom dinos. 
- Heavily modded, slow progression. 
- #2 of 2 ASA clusters for slowest character progression. 
- #2 of 2 ASA clusters for dino survival difficulty.
- Only Automation is item sorting and crop maintenance. No automation for anything a dino can do for you.
- Medium level breeding difficulty, more costly mutations and potions for convenience. No automated egg pickups, incubations, and baby nannies when dinos can do it for you!

<RichColor Color="0,0,1,1">My Other Life ASA [LifeASA]</>
- PC & Consoles. 
- High Level QoL focus so you can reach end-game quickly.
- The easiest of all our ASA servers. 
- #1 of 3 ASA servers for quickest progression. 
- #1 of 3 clusters for easiest dino survival.
- Automation.
- Passive resource generation systems.
- Easiest and quickest automated breeding with potions for Gender Change, Instant Grow, Skip Breeding Timer, etc. 

<TextStyle.White>---OUR ORIGINAL ASE CLUSTERS---</>
<RichColor Color="0,0,1,1">Aardwolf's Spirit ASE [AASpirit]</> 
- PC Epic & Steam cross-play. 
- No mods, but boosted stats.

<RichColor Color="0,0,1,1">My Other Life ASE [LifeASE]</> 
- PC Steam Only. 
- High Level QoL focus so you can reach end-game quickly.
